title.narrative: Competitiveness of the Sugar Sector (CSS) in the Dominican Republic, Honduras, and El Salvador

description.narrative: The Project has the following objectives: Development objective. To contribute to sustainable enterprise create productive, decent jobs and enhanced labour rights compliance in the sugar sector in the Dominican Repulbic, Honduras and El Salvador. Immediate objective 1: Increased dialogue and collaboration between employers and workers at plan level in the sugar sector in each participating country. Immediate objective 2: Ministries of Labour attain institutional capacity to promote and monitor labour rights and increase compliance of committees from bipartite agreements at plant level in the sugar sector Immediate objective 3: Improved training services and productivity-enhancing methodologies available to the sugar cane sector in the selected countries

transaction.ref: RLA/11/01/CAN-2012-SSJ104 - Las instancias subregionales de diálogo sectorial y tripartito, fortalecidas en su capacidad para definir estrategias de promoción del trabajo decente en el marco de la integración subregional.-C
